abstract: The British company has been trying to untangle itself from a troublesome partnership with Russian billionaires.
snippet: The British company has been trying to untangle itself from a troublesome partnership with Russian billionaires.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW — BP may finally be close to resolving a long-running business dispute over its joint venture in Russia.

headline.main: BP’s Chief and Putin Meet, a Sign of Movement in a Joint Venture’s Dispute
headline.print_headline: BP’s Chief and Putin Meet, a Sign of Movement in a Troubled Joint Venture
